Class ShapeUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • ShapeUtils

  • public class ShapeUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    DO NOT CHANGE Utility class for Shapes to assist with determining the relative location of points Used in tests
    Version:
    October 26, 2017 Lab 10
    Author:
    CS2334 Programming Structures and Abstractions

    • Method Detail

      • pointInSet

        public static boolean pointInSet(java.awt.Point[] points,
                                 java.awt.Point point)
        Return true if a point is in a set of points.
        Parameters:
        points - Set of points
        point - Point in question
        Returns:
        true if the point in question is equal to one of the points in the set

      • pointInSet

        public static boolean pointInSet(java.awt.Point[] points,
                                 java.awt.Point point,
                                 int delta)
        Return true if a point is in a set of points.
        Parameters:
        points - Set of points
        point - Point in question
        delta - point must be within delta of each point (along each dimension)
        Returns:
        true if the point is within some delta distance of a point in the set
